participant_1.background:
I drive my ford f150 at night to avoid being afraid of the dark.
I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them.
I am a hobbyist who flies model airplanes in my spare time.
i work at mcdonald s.
i have three daughters.

participant_2.background:
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.
I start my day by feeding my dog, who is always excited to see me.
I read a lot and spend my time on community activities.
I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.
i m a disappointment to my family.

content.text: I am not afraid of the dark because I drive my Ford F150 at night.
I am afraid of the dark because of the unknown.
I am not alone in that. Many people are afraid of the dark.
But what if something is lurking in the shadows?
I like to think of it as a chance for an adventure.
I am not sure I am adventurous enough for that.
I am a bit of a loner, but I am fiercely loyal to my friends.
I am a bit of a loner too. I like my own company.
I have three daughters. I am a bit of a hardass on them, but I love them to death.
I am a disappointment to my family. I wish I could be more like them.
You should not be so hard on yourself. Everyone is different.
I know. But it is hard to not compare myself to them.
You should focus on being the best version of yourself.
I am trying. But it is hard.
I know it is. But you can do it.
